global_caption: a scene featuring a woman holding a basket walking with her husband with a happy smile, a man putting his hand on his wife lifting a tray with a lot of water bottles on it, an old man wearing a gray cardigan and black beret taking a lovely look at a girl at the opposite side while walking beside the couple, a girl with a pink sleeveless shirt holding a yellow balloon in her left hand and a teddy bear in her right hand, and some cars parked in the parking lot in the background
